summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Lighting; accepting the offer of Frank J. Tonkin and Syble Tonkin, his wife, and Frank W. Nelson and Iola D. Nelson, his wife, to purchase certain City (Lighting Department) property located at 1911 Maple Valley Highway, known as the Renton Patrol Headquarters, in Renton, Washington, and authorizing execution of a quitclaim deed.
